text: Take a look at that and tell me everything that you see happening in the picture. Everything that's going on. Well, the little girl is reaching for a cookie and the boy is on a stool which is falling over to get in the cookie jar up on the second shelf of the cupboard. The door opened, the faucet is running and it's overflowing onto the floor because it's overflowing into the sink. The woman is drying a plate. She's also looking at...
